BasicInfo.short: Wink is a community-based social search engine enabling users to find people and their profiles.

Products.name: Wink
Products.description: Type in someone's name, location and almost any other fact about them (company, school, club) to find their profile in Wink.

Products.name: Wink Hub

Products.description: The Wink Relay is a zigbee Hub that allows for full control of the Wink app via a mounted interface.
